mapper.insert: insert into todo (create_user, modify_user, title, completed) values (#{createUser}, #{modifyUser}, #{title}, #{completed})
mapper.update: update todo set version=version+1, modified=current_timestamp, modify_user=#{modifyUser}, title=#{title}, completed=#{completed} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select id, version, created, create_user, modified, modify_user, title, completed from todo where id=#{id}
select id, version, created, create_user, modified, modify_user, title, completed from todo where id=#{id} and version=#{version} for update
select id, version, created, create_user, modified, modify_user, title, completed from todo order by id
select id, version, created, create_user, modified, modify_user, title, completed from todo for update
